title: Apple TV+ hit ‘Ted Lasso’ begins filming for Season 3, which could be its last
content:
The cast of Apple TV+ comedy hit Ted Lasso is back in action and filming its third season. According to Parade, the show began filming on March 6 in London. 

more…

The post Apple TV+ hit ‘Ted Lasso’ begins filming for Season 3, which could be its last appeared first on 9to5Mac.
